resources.name: Get Events
Create Event
resources.description:
Create a new event

Body Parameters
---
  - `name`<string>

Request Example
---
```
POST http://localhost:5000/events
{
	"name": "kibana course 3"
}
```
  
Response Example
---
```
{
  "event": {
    "name": "kibana course 3",
    "id": "60ebcb722d7f3a2be43935d4"
  }
}
```

resources.name: Get Event
resources.description:
Get specific event by eventId

Request Parameters
---
  - eventId


Request Example
---
`GET http://localhost:5000/events/60ebc52ea111d4217d2cdc28`

Response Example
---
```
{
  "event": {
    "name": "kibana course 3",
    "id": "60ebc52ea111d4217d2cdc28"
  }
}
```

resources.name: Get Workspaces
resources.description:
Get all of the workspaces

Request Example
---
`GET http://localhost:5000/workspaces`

Response Example
---
```
{
  "workspaces": [
    {
      "eventId": "60ebc52ea111d4217d2cdc28",
      "owner": "jon@doe.com",
      "status": "preparing",
      "createdAt": "2021-07-12T04:51:22.531Z",
      "updatedAt": "2021-07-12T04:51:22.531Z",
      "id": "60ebca4a62a32f2a741de93f"
    },
    {
      "eventId": "60ebc52ea111d4217d2cdc28",
      "owner": "jon@doe.com",
      "status": "preparing",
      "createdAt": "2021-07-12T04:51:27.147Z",
      "updatedAt": "2021-07-12T04:51:27.147Z",
      "id": "60ebca4f62a32f2a741de941"
    }
  ]
}
```

resources.name: Get Event Workspaces
resources.description:
Get workspaces attached to a specific event

Request Parameters
---
  - eventId


Request Example
---
`GET http://localhost:5000/workspaces/60ebc52ea111d4217d2cdc28`

Response Example
---
```
{
  "workspaces": [
    {
      "eventId": "60ebc52ea111d4217d2cdc28",
      "owner": "jon@doe.com",
      "status": "preparing",
      "createdAt": "2021-07-12T04:51:22.531Z",
      "updatedAt": "2021-07-12T04:51:22.531Z",
      "id": "60ebca4a62a32f2a741de93f"
    },
    {
      "eventId": "60ebc52ea111d4217d2cdc28",
      "owner": "jon@doe.com",
      "status": "preparing",
      "createdAt": "2021-07-12T04:51:27.147Z",
      "updatedAt": "2021-07-12T04:51:27.147Z",
      "id": "60ebca4f62a32f2a741de941"
    }
  ]
}
```

resources.name: Add Workspace To Event
resources.description:
Add workspace to event

Request Parameters
---
  - eventId

Body Parameters
---
  - `owner`<string> - The owner's email
  - `status` <enum> - The status of the workspace

Request Example
---
```
POST http://localhost:5000/workspaces/60ebc52ea111d4217d2cdc28
{
	"owner": "jon@doe.com",
	"status": "preparing"
}
```
  
Response Example
---
```
  {
  "workspace": {
    "eventId": "60ebc52ea111d4217d2cdc28",
    "owner": "jon@doe.com",
    "status": "preparing",
    "createdAt": "2021-07-12T06:55:31.004Z",
    "updatedAt": "2021-07-12T06:55:31.004Z",
    "id": "60ebe762db5dea6bee8dca60"
  }
 }
```
